                      int number,
                      java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                      int interval,
                      double money)
        Constructor of AddStockToPortfolio, it initializes the AddStockToPortfolio object.
        Parameters:
        option - the option that user choose.
        strategyName - strategy name that user created.
        number - number of stocks in the strategy.
        startDate - startDate of the strategy.
        interval - interval of the strategy. Invest period.
        money - how much money will be invested every circle.
